body:
Hey everyone, this post is in Off Topic, not media, because it is not really about Avicus and is only dedicated to my subscribers on YouTube, so i don't want to hear hate about my channel or whether its related to Avicus, etc. because I've broken no rules.

Some mods may think otherwise, so lock this if you must, but this is just a post to say:

OPTOBAT's Weekend Skits - Episode 2! will be out by the end of this weekend :)
This one, is not quite as funky and odd as the first episode, as it is more of a short movie style clip of a short, short holiday i am having in the outskirts of my home city near the beach.

Thats the other thing, i will not be active as much on Avicus or YouTube this weekend, so sorry about that, but ill be having a great time and filming a brand new skit for you :D

Thanks for reading guys!

Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6qZ9vdryr7m-4sS0i9kL3Q

title: Channel Skit #2! (YouTube)

replies.body:
This post bothers me,  you ask for no hate and say u have broken no rules,  well you'll probably get hate,  there is no rule in Avicus saying we cant give our options,  but other wise I didn't get to watch the video cause I don't have my account. 

Ps: try not to spam the forums with almost every video,  if people actually want to watch it they can go on YouTube themselves,  

-Ezbirdy
